abstract: New York City Education Department gives Public School 84 on Upper West Side a grade of F for school's progress from 2010 to 2011, shocking many parents of students there.
snippet: The grading left parents of students at Public School 84 wondering how they would win over new families.
lead_paragraph: The grading left parents of students at Public School 84 wondering how they would win over new families.

headline.main: ‘F’ Grade Shocks a School Whose Popularity Was Rising
headline.print_headline: ‘F’ Grade Shocks a School Whose Popularity Was Rising
headline.seo: ‘F’ Grade Shocks New York’s Public School 84
